channel.title: Anime on AGou's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Anime on AGou's blog

item.title: 我的动漫之旅(My Anime Trip.)
item.description: @font-face { font-family: 'iconFont'; src: url("/fonts/Cookiemonster-gv11.ttf"); } .content-wrapper { background-image: url('http://www.dmoe.cc/random.php'); background-size: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed; cursor: url(https://agou-images.oss-cn-qingdao.aliyuncs.com/BaseIMG/gam1571.ani), url(https://agou-images.oss-cn-qingdao.aliyuncs.com/BaseIMG/gam1571.png), auto !important; } .post { border-radius: 10px; cursor: url(https://agou-images.oss-cn-qingdao.aliyuncs.com/BaseIMG/gam1571.ani), url(https://agou-images.oss-cn-qingdao.aliyuncs.com/BaseIMG/gam1571.png), auto !important; } .bg-white { opacity: 0.92; } #headerdiva { font-family: 'iconFont'; } #menuli:nth-child(5)a { color: #FF69B4; font-weight: bold; } .wrapper { width: 200px; display: block; user-select: none; bottom: 0; position: fixed; left: -3px; z-index: -2; } @media (max-width: 767px)
